required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Open-label Study to Assess the Absorption, Metabolism, Excretion, and Mass Balance of a Single Oral Dose of [14C]-20 mg/100 μCi Anaprazole Sodium Enteric-coated Capsule in Healthy Adult Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open, Single Dose Mass Balance Study to Assess the Absorption, Metabolism, Excretion of [14C]-20 mg/100 μCi Anaprazole Sodium Enteric-coated Capsule in Chinese Health Adult Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, single-dose, absorption, metabolism, excretion, and mass balance study following a single oral dose of [14C]-20 mg/100 μCi Anaprazole Sodium enteric-coated capsule in healthy adult male subjects. Whole blood, plasma samples will be collected at hour 0 pre-dose and 1，2，3，4，5，6，8，12，24，48，72，96，120，144，168 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to plasma drug concentration); urine samples will be collected at hour 24 pre-dose and 0-4，4-8，8-12，12-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate) ; fecal samples will be collected at hour 24 pre-dose and 0-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate) following the start of administration to measure total radioactivity and plasma drug concentrations.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of Anaprazole according to total radioactivity concentration equivalents in whole blood and plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 pre-dose and 1，2，3，4，5，6，8，12，24，48，72，96，120，144，168 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to plasma drug concentration)
primary_outcome.description: Cmax is the peak plasma concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax of Anaprazole according to total radioactivity concentration equivalents in whole blood and plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 pre-dose and 1，2，3，4，5，6，8，12，24，48，72，96，120，144，168 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to plasma drug concentration)
primary_outcome.description: Tmax is the time to maximum plasma concentration

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of Anaprazole according to total radioactivity concentration equivalents in whole blood and plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 pre-dose and 1，2，3，4，5，6，8，12，24，48，72，96，120，144，168 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to plasma drug concentration)
primary_outcome.description: AUC is area under the plasma concentration-time curve

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative excretion and cumulative excretion rate in urine
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 24 pre-dose and 0-4，4-8，8-12，12-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate)
primary_outcome.description: Sum of the percent of the total radioactivity recovered in urine relative to the administered radioactivity dose

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative excretion and cumulative excretion rate in feces
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 24 pre-dose and 0-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate)
primary_outcome.description: Sum of the percent of the total radioactivity recovered in feces relative to the administered radioactivity dose

primary_outcome.measure: Radioactivity spectrum indentification of metabolites in plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 pre-dose and 1，2，3，4，5，6，8，12，24，48，72，96，120，144，168 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to plasma drug concentration)

primary_outcome.measure: Radioactivity spectrum indentification of metabolites in urine
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 24 pre-dose and 0-4，4-8，8-12，12-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate)
Hour 24 pre-dose and 0-24，24-48，48-72，72-96，96-120，120-144，144-168，168-192，192-216，216-240 hours post-dose (tentative, adjusted according to sample recovery rate)
primary_outcome.description: Sum of the percent of the total radioactivity recovered in feces relative to the administered radioactivity dose
